titles.title: Coin Metal Modification Authorization and Cost Savings Act of 2025
Coin Metal Modification Authorization and Cost Savings Act of 2025
To amend title 31, United States Code, to save Federal funds by authorizing changes to the composition of circulating coins, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on the Budget, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
